H0.text: Where does the draw for the Euromillions lottery prize usually take place. Brussels

H1.text: Where does the draw for the Euromillions lottery prize usually take place. Madrid

H2.text: Where does the draw for the Euromillions lottery prize usually take place. Luxembourg

H3.text: Where does the draw for the Euromillions lottery prize usually take place. Paříž

A4.text: Draws are held every Tuesday and Friday night at approximately 21:05 CET in Paris.

A5.text: The first draw was held on 13 February 2004 in Paris.
